Starters.nom: Pan-fried duck foie gras with quince
Starters.desc: cake and infusion of quince with verbena
cream of porcini mushrooms, black tea emulsion

Fishes.desc: artichoke mousseline, fish stock with kalamansi lemon

Fishes.desc: variation of rice and shellfish, turmeric juice

Duckling fillet roasted on the skin, port juice infused with hibiscus
Meats.desc: fig tartlet and candied thigh, small fig chartreuse

Meats.nom: Veal sweetbread with sautoir and porcini mushrooms
Meats.desc: mushroom mousseline, veal jus with Morvan cazette

Cheeses.nom: Trolley of matured cheeses from our regions

Desserts.nom: Pear Louise Bonne poached with sweet lemon
Desserts.desc: Frozen Nepeta parfait, small spelled crumble
vanilla chiboust and grand cru chocolate from Madagascar

Desserts.nom: Fine apple pie from Bernard Loiseau
